item.title: Dozens go on trial over North Macedonia nightclub fire that killed 63
item.description: Thirty-five people and three institutions are on trial. Prosecutors say years of failings turned the venue into a death trap.

item.title: Israeli strikes across Gaza kill 25 Palestinians, health ministry says
item.description: The Israeli military says it struck several Hamas targets after gunmen fired at soldiers in Gaza in violation of the five-week-old ceasefire.

item.title: All 267 passengers and crew rescued after South Korean ferry runs aground
item.description: The vessel remains stuck on a reef and unable to move, but there is no risk of sinking, the Coast Guard said.

item.title: All 267 passengers and crew rescued after South Korean ferry runs aground
item.description: The vessel remains stuck on a reef and unable to move, but there is no risk of sinking, the Coast Guard said.

item.title: Instagram owner Meta tells Australian teens accounts will close
item.description: Under-sixteens will be banned from major social media plaforms from 10 December.
